mapper.select: select id, category, title, url, file_id AS fileId, thumbnail_id AS thumbnailId, description, hashtags, user_id AS userId, create_dt AS createDt, mod_dt AS modDT, delete_yn AS deleteYn from board where delete_yn = '0' order by create_dt desc limit #{startIndex}, #{cntPerPage}
select count(*) from board where delete_yn = '0'
mapper.insert: insert into board(category, title, url, file_id, thumbnail_id, description, hashtags, user_id, create_dt) values(#{category}, #{title}, #{url}, #{fileId}, #{thumbnailId}, #{description}, #{hashtags}, #{userId}, NOW())
